translation.en: Allegations against one basketball ref of betting on
translation.es: Acusaciones contra un árbitro por apostar

translation.en: and even tilting the outcome of games is rocking the NBA.
translation.es: e incluso influenciar el resultado de los partidos.

translation.en: Commissioner David Stern said today

translation.es: que es la peor situación que haya enfrentado

translation.en: as head of the National Basketball Association.
translation.es: como jefe de la NBA.

translation.en: This is not anything other than an act of betrayal.
translation.es: Esto no es más que un acto de traición.

translation.es: El exárbitro, Tim Donaghy,

translation.en: pleaded guilty to betting on basketball games,
translation.es: se declaró culpable de apostar en partidos,

translation.en: including games in which he was officiating.
translation.es: incluyendo partidos que dirigió.

translation.es: También se sospecha que Donaghy puede haber trabajado con la mafia

translation.en: in a point- shaving scandal.
translation.es: para manipular resultados.

translation.es: Un oficial encargado de la integridad del deporte

translation.en: now said to be receiving death threats.
translation.es: que ahora recibe amenazas de muerte.

translation.en: with respect to calling those games.
translation.es: con respecto a los partidos.

translation.en: This is not a situation where games were manipulated or fixed.

translation.en: He denies that it ever took place?

translation.en: Absolutely unconditionally.

translation.en: Uh, what are we doing here?

translation.en: I know what we're doing here, right?
translation.es: Sé lo que hacemos aquí.

translation.en: Tim Donaghy, one of the officials…
translation.es: Tim Donaghy, uno de los oficiales…

translation.en: Everybody always asked, Did he fix the games? Did he fix the games? Did he fix the games? You know.

translation.en: Donaghy's two alleged coconspirators, Thomas Martino and James Battista.
translation.es: Los dos supuestos cómplices de Donaghy, Thomas Martino y James Battista.

translation.en: He fixed them like a motherfucker. He was the greatest.
translation.es: Los arregló como un hijo de puta. Era el mejor.

translation.en: That's my only positive thing I could say about him.
translation.es: Es lo único positivo que puedo decir de él.

translation.en: There was nobody that can control the whistle like Timmy did.
translation.es: Nadie podía controlar el silbato como Timmy.

translation.en: One night he said it to me… And I remember he said it.
translation.es: …NO HAY RAZÓN PARA VOLVER A REVISAR ESTO. Una noche me lo dijo. Y recuerdo que lo dijo.

translation.en: I can influence games six points either way.

translation.en: I did something that was stupid and unfathomable.
translation.es: Hice algo estúpido e incomprensible.

translation.en: I had a great job. Great family, nice house, great cars.
translation.es: Tenía un gran trabajo. Una gran familia, una linda casa, buenos autos.

translation.en: Man, did I fuck my life up.
translation.es: Me arruiné la vida.

translation.en: I grew up in Delaware County.
translation.es: Crecí en el condado de Delaware.

translation.en: I loved the game of basketball growing up.

translation.en: It's all I did, all I dreamt of, and all I wanted to be a part of.
translation.es: Es todo lo que hacía y soñaba con ser parte del deporte.

translation.en: Growing up outside Philadelphia, the Sixers were great at the time.

translation.en: They won a Championship.

translation.en: - I never missed a game. -

translation.en: You know, I saw the friendships that he made with other officials.

translation.en: I saw the excitement that you get by being a part of the game at a very young age.

translation.en: You! Out of here!

translation.en: From there, I was put on the staff to officiate in the CBA.
translation.es: Luego, me contrataron para dirigir en la CBA.

translation.en: Personable gentleman, nice to talk with.
translation.es: Es un buen conversador…

translation.es: Yo era azafata, y Tim estaba en la CBA,

translation.en: which are the farm teams.
translation.es: los equipos de desarrollo de jugadores.

translation.es: Una mañana, a las seis, se subió a mi avión.

translation.en: and he was as cute and cocky as all get- out,
translation.es: No podía ser más lindo ni más arrogante.

translation.es: Dijo: Me sentaré a tu lado.

translation.en: And I said, No, you're not. You're gonna sit in your seat.
translation.es: Y yo dije: No. Te sentarás en tu asiento.

translation.en: And he sat right by me.
translation.es: Y se sentó a mi lado.

translation.en: And so he just instantly made me laugh.
translation.es: Entonces me hizo reír de inmediato.

translation.en: And made me laugh all the way from Moline to Chicago.
translation.es: Y me hizo reír desde Moline hasta Chicago.

translation.en: We got married on a beach. I was pregnant and barefoot.
translation.es: Nos casamos en una playa. Estaba embarazada y descalza.

translation.en: It was just he and I, right in front of the water.
translation.es: Estábamos solo él y yo, frente al agua.

translation.en: We gave a disposable camera to someone who was standing there,
translation.es: Le dimos una cámara descartable a alguien que estaba ahí.

translation.en: and they snapped the pictures, and that was it.

translation.en: When he told me that his goal was to get into the NBA,
translation.es: Cuando me dijo que su objetivo era llegar a la NBA,

translation.en: I thought, That… That's great. That's fantastic.
translation.es: pensé: Genial. Fantástico.

translation.en: What a neat thing. You know, there are only 50 of them in the whole country.
translation.es: Qué gran cosa. Solo hay 50 árbitros en todo el país.

translation.en: So really, whatever I could do to support him, I did.
translation.es: Así que hice todo lo que pude para apoyarlo.

translation.es: Cuando pasas por las ligas menores,

translation.en: there's a lot of lonely days on the road.
translation.es: hay muchos días solitarios.

translation.en: And you're saying, Is this all worth it?

translation.en: Am I gonna make it? Am I going to be the one chosen?
translation.es: ¿Lo lograré? ¿Me elegirán?.

translation.es: El día que recibió la llamada,

translation.en: he called me, and he said, I got in.

translation.es: Dos palabras. Estoy adentro.

translation.es: Árbitros de esta noche: Paul Mihalak, Blane Reichelt y Tim Donaghy.

translation.es: Mihalak, Reichelt y Donaghy.

translation.es: En mi primer partido Houston visitaba a Indiana.

translation.en: And the Rockets win the tip.
translation.es: Los Rockets ganan el salto.

translation.en: Reggie Miller, he loved to hold and grab coming off screens.
translation.es: A Reggie Miller le encantaban los agarres luego de una pantalla.

translation.en: He loved to pump- fake and jump into people.
translation.es: Le encantaba amagar y generar contacto.

translation.en: It was a close game.

translation.en: Taking it down to Olajuwon. Spinning to the middle.
translation.es: Ataca a Olajuwon. Gira hacia el medio.

translation.en: and boy, look at the debris come out on the court…
translation.es: Mira todo lo que cae sobre la cancha…

translation.en: The Indiana fans just went berserk
translation.es: Los fanáticos se volvieron locos

translation.en: and were throwing stuff on the floor for, felt like, two hours.
translation.es: y arrojaron cosas por lo que parecieron dos horas.

translation.es: Le dije a Paul Mehalik:

translation.en: Just put the ball in play.

translation.es: Los Houston Rockets intentan salir de la cancha.

translation.es: Me miró y me dijo:

translation.en: We'll find out real quick if you'll make it in this league.
translation.es: Vamos a ver rápido si puedes triunfar en esta liga.

translation.en: And we went back to the hotel room and watched the tape.

translation.en: And he said it was the right call.
translation.es: Fue la decisión correcta.

translation.en: If this young man's gonna grow up to be an official in this league,
translation.es: Si este joven dirige en esta liga, tendrá que tomar decisiones difíciles.

translation.en: he's going to have to make the tough call, and he did the right thing.

translation.en: The two of them fed off of each other.

translation.es: Un día, cuando estaba en primer grado,

translation.en: He had good street smarts. Easygoing, always made people happy.

translation.en: You wanted to be around Tommy.

translation.en: Baba and Donaghy were not friends. They were acquaintances.

translation.en: I was friends with Jimmy. I was friends with Timmy.
translation.es: Yo era amigo de Jimmy y era amigo de Timmy.

translation.en: - - I was their link.

translation.en: Tim was hilarious.
translation.es: Tim era muy gracioso.

translation.en: He was the prankster, you know. He was the guy pulling the fire alarm.
translation.es: Era un bromista. Activaba la alarma de incendios.

translation.en: Jimmy was a God- fearing, churchgoing boy just like we were.

translation.en: And his family was very strict with him.

translation.en: Maybe that's why he rebelled a little bit.
translation.es: Quizá por eso se rebeló un poco

translation.en: And got mixed up with them guys.
translation.es: y se metió con ellos.

translation.en: I graduated high school by the skin of my teeth 'cause I didn't give a fuck.
translation.es: Me gradué de la secundaria con lo justo porque no me importaba un carajo.

translation.en: But I got a job at a restaurant called Lombardo's.
translation.es: Pero conseguí trabajo en un restaurante.

translation.en: Louis Lombardo, Lump, he gave me a job, and I worked as a waiter.
translation.es: Louis Lombardo, Lump, me dio trabajo. Trabajé como mesero.

translation.en: Phillies lost that night.

translation.en: Here I am working, hoping to make 300 a night as a waiter.
translation.es: Yo esperaba ganar $300 por noche como mesero.

translation.en: I said, That motherfucker made $1,000 not doing nothing!
translation.es: Pensé: Él ganó $1000 sin hacer nada.

translation.en: And right there, that started my love for gambling.
translation.es: Y ahí comenzó mi amor por las apuestas.

translation.es: Un nickel eran $500.

translation.en: A stick is a hundred thousand.
translation.es: Un stick, $100 000.

translation.en: and that was a million.

translation.en: Nickel, dime, stick, and balloon.
translation.es: Nickel, dime, stick y balloon.

translation.en: The Animals…
translation.es: The Animals

translation.en: We were taking money out of people's pockets,

translation.en: and we were good.
translation.es: y éramos buenos.

translation.en: This is a chance for 'em to put it away.

translation.en: Any sporting event that we can get inside information on.
translation.es: Buscábamos información privilegiada de cualquier evento.

translation.en: College football. College basketball.
translation.es: Fútbol universitario. Básquet universitario.

translation.en: NBA. We didn't care what league it was.
translation.es: La NBA. No nos importaba. Si eran dos malditas cucarachas…

translation.en: If it was two fucking cockroaches, it was about getting the right information.
translation.es: No nos importaba. Si eran dos malditas cucarachas… Se trataba de tener información. Y yo tenía una buena personalidad

translation.en: And I had a good personality
translation.es: Se trataba de tener información. Y yo tenía una buena personalidad

translation.en: to get information out of people on a one- to- one basis.
translation.es: para sacarle información a la gente.

translation.es: No tienen nada que perder,

translation.en: so it's gonna be a half- court…
translation.es: así que será algo…

translation.en: - And a technical foul is called. - That's gonna be on Juwan--
translation.es: Cobran una falta técnica. Se la cobran a Juwan.

translation.en: - Hanging on the rim. - It won't…
translation.es: - Por colgarse del aro. - No es…

translation.es: Cuando te contratan en la liga, crees que todo se hace

translation.en: based on the rules how they're written in the rule book.
translation.es: según el reglamento.

translation.en: You quickly learn, if you're gonna survive, that's not the way things are done.
translation.es: Pero, para sobrevivir, debes aprender que no es así.

translation.en: I started to understand the game within the game
translation.es: Comencé a entender el juego dentro del juego de la NBA.

translation.en: of the NBA, and I'll give you an example.
translation.es: Comencé a entender el juego dentro del juego de la NBA. Les daré un ejemplo.

translation.en: I was in Philadelphia, and I'm refereeing Sixers- Bulls.
translation.es: Dirigía un partido entre los Sixers y los Bulls.

translation.en: They were cracking down on a spin move that they wanted the officials to call traveling.
translation.es: La liga quería que los árbitros cobraran caminata en un giro específico.

translation.en: And Michael Jordan does the spin move, and I make the call.
translation.es: Michael Jordan hace el giro y yo cobré la infracción.

translation.en: Michael on the block, travel.
translation.es: Michael en el poste bajo. Caminata.

translation.en: Phil Jackson comes flying off the bench, and he starts giving me shit.
translation.es: Phil Jackson sale volando de la banca y empieza a protestar.

translation.en: And I say, Wait a second, Phil. You know as well as I do,
translation.es: Dije: Phil. Sabes tan bien como yo

translation.en: that's the spin move that they're telling us to call.
translation.es: que ese es el giro que quieren que cobremos.

translation.en: And he said, They may want that play called, but they certainly don't want it called on him.
translation.es: Y él dijo: Quieren que lo cobres, pero no a él.

translation.en: And he pointed at Jordan, who walked by and just stared at me.
translation.es: Y apuntó a Jordan, que pasaba mirándome fijo.

translation.en: I got in the locker room. The other referee said,
translation.es: Entré al vestuario. El otro árbitro dijo: Quieren que lo cobres, pero no a él.

translation.en: They want that call, but don't call it on him.
translation.es: El otro árbitro dijo: Quieren que lo cobres, pero no a él.

translation.en: The way David Stern structured the league,
translation.es: Como David Stern estructuró la liga,

translation.en: we as officials knew that it was better
translation.es: nosotros, los árbitros, sabíamos que debíamos tratar mejor a las estrellas.

translation.en: to treat the star players better than others.
translation.es: sabíamos que debíamos tratar mejor a las estrellas.

translation.en: I just wanted to be the best referee and advance up the ladder,
translation.es: Yo quería ser el mejor árbitro y ascender en el escalafón.

translation.en: and I saw the way guys that were in the NBA Finals handled the game.
translation.es: Vi cómo dirigían los partidos los árbitros que estaban en las finales.

translation.en: They didn't call fouls against the stars, and they were well- respected.
translation.es: No cobraban faltas contra las estrellas y eran muy respetados.

translation.en: These people that pay thousands of dollars to sit courtside here,
translation.es: La gente que paga miles de dólares para sentarse al lado de la cancha

translation.en: they didn't come here to see Kobe Bryant, LeBron James,
translation.es: no quiere ver a Kobe Bryant, a LeBron James

translation.en: Shaquille O'Neal sit on the bench.
translation.es: o a Shaquille O'Neal en el banco.

translation.en: They came to see them play.
translation.es: Quieren verlos jugar.

translation.en: The league's your boss, and you want them to think you're doing a good job because, if that's the case,
translation.es: La liga es tu jefe, y quieres hacer un buen trabajo

translation.en: you're on that playoff roster that comes out.
translation.es: para estar en la lista de las eliminatorias.

translation.en: With that is an enormous amount more money and… and respect.
translation.es: Eso trae una enorme cantidad de dinero y respeto.

translation.en: - - Yo! Timothy!
translation.es: ¡Oye! ¡Timothy!

translation.en: As an official, if you were on a ten- day trip
translation.es: Si estabas en un viaje de diez días con los mismos tipos,

translation.en: and you were with the same guys, it was like a brotherhood.
translation.es: Si estabas en un viaje de diez días con los mismos tipos, era como una hermandad.

translation.en: You became family, really.
translation.es: Era una familia, de verdad.

translation.en: Scott Foster, he was, you know, like a brother to me.
translation.es: Scott Foster era como un hermano para mí.

translation.en: It was written in the contract that you couldn't place a bet of any kind.
translation.es: En el contrato estaba escrito que no podías apostar.

translation.en: Whether it was a golf match or going to a casino.
translation.es: Ya sea un partido de golf o ir a un casino.

translation.en: A lot of the referees went to the casinos on the road and liked to gamble.
translation.es: Muchos de los jueces iban a casinos, les gustaba apostar.

translation.en: Sometimes we'd play little games as officials.
translation.es: Teníamos pequeños juegos como árbitros.

translation.en: A lot of times, starting the games,
translation.es: Muchas veces, al comenzar un partido,

translation.en: we would bet who called the first foul of the game.
translation.es: apostábamos quién cobraría la primera falta.

translation.en: That's slapped away by Strickland.
translation.es: Le roba el balón.

translation.en: Twenty bucks, thirty bucks, fifty bucks, dinner that night.
translation.es: Veinte, 30 o 50 dólares. O la cena de esa noche.

translation.en: We did it one time and got to the two or three- minute mark of the first quarter,
translation.es: Una vez llegamos a los dos o tres minutos del primer cuarto.

translation.en: and bodies were fucking flying all over the place.
translation.es: Había cuerpos volando por todos lados.

translation.en: - A lot of that stuff went on. -
translation.es: Había muchas de esas cosas.

translation.en: Now he's not getting the call--
translation.es: …no cobran la falta…

translation.en: And a technical foul. Tim Donaghy calls a technical.
translation.es: Tim Donaghy cobra una falta técnica.

translation.en: And his second one. And Tim Donaghy has missed several calls tonight,
translation.es: Es su segunda. Tim Donaghy no vio varias infracciones claras.

translation.en: and when Mike Dunleavy complains, Donaghy tosses him out of the game.
translation.es: Cuando Mike Dunleavy se quejó, Donaghy lo echó del partido.

translation.en: When I noticed that things were shifting,
translation.es: Noté que las cosas estaban cambiando.

translation.en: he would come home,
translation.es: Él regresaba a casa

translation.en: and I didn't know
translation.es: y yo no sabía

translation.en: what Tim I was gonna get when he walked in the door.
translation.es: qué Tim iba a entrar por la puerta.

translation.en: I didn't know if I was gonna get happy, fun Tim
translation.es: No sabía si iba a ser el Tim feliz y divertido

translation.en: or if I was gonna get the Tim that dropped his bag
translation.es: o el Tim que dejaba su bolso al pie de las escaleras

translation.en: at the bottom of the stairs and just walk up to his room
translation.es: o el Tim que dejaba su bolso al pie de las escaleras y subía a su cuarto a hablar por teléfono.

translation.en: and get on the phone.
translation.es: y subía a su cuarto a hablar por teléfono.

translation.en: And Bonzi Wells has been tossed,
translation.es: Echan a Bonzi Wells.

translation.en: and Tim Donaghy with quick whistles all night long.
translation.es: Tim Donaghy cobra todo esta noche.

translation.en: And Bonzi Wells now joins Mike Dunleavy in the Portland locker room.
translation.es: Bonzi Wells se reunirá con Mike Dunleavy en el vestuario de Portland.

translation.en: You can't touch the official.
translation.es: No se puede tocar al árbitro.

translation.en: Right over the house.
translation.es: A la casa.

translation.en: Tim, it probably wouldn't be a very good idea.
translation.es: Tim, no creo que sea buena idea.

translation.en: My parents still have nine months left here.
translation.es: Mis padres aún tienen nueve meses aquí.

translation.en: I only knew who he was talking to when somebody called the house phone,
translation.es: Solo sabía con quién hablaba cuando alguien llamaba a casa.

translation.en: and it was usually Jack.
translation.es: Normalmente era Jack.

translation.en: Jack Concannon was a guy from Delaware County.
translation.es: Jack Concannon era un tipo del condado de Delaware.

translation.en: We played golf three, four times a week together.
translation.es: Jugábamos al golf tres o cuatro veces por semana.

translation.en: Jack and I started betting, uh… football, baseball.
translation.es: Jack y yo empezamos a apostar al fútbol y al béisbol.

translation.en: We just had a lot of fun together.
translation.es: Nos divertíamos mucho juntos.

translation.en: When Jack would call the house, I would say, Tim, your girlfriend's on the phone.
translation.es: Cuando Jack llamaba, yo decía Tim, te llama tu novia.

translation.en: And he immediately knew that it was Jack
translation.es: Y él sabía que era Jack,

translation.en: because they talked five, six, seven times a day.
translation.es: porque hablaban cinco, seis o siete veces al día.

translation.en: It had 15 plays on it a day that, win or lose,
translation.es: Tenía una lista con  unas 15 apuestas por día que podían significar cinco o diez mil dólares.

translation.en: it could mean five or ten thousand dollars.
translation.es: que podían significar cinco o diez mil dólares.

translation.en: We kind of went in partners.
translation.es: Éramos socios.

translation.en: He put the bets in, and at the end of the week,
translation.es: Él hacía las apuestas y, al final de la semana,

translation.en: we would square up.
translation.es: arreglábamos cuentas.

translation.en: And then, I'll never forget, one time we went to play golf.
translation.es: Nunca olvidaré una vez que fuimos a jugar golf.

translation.en: Before we played, he said,
translation.es: Antes de empezar, dijo:

translation.en: Give me some winners of… of the games tonight in the NBA.
translation.es: Dime quiénes ganarán hoy en la NBA.

translation.en: And I looked at the lines in the paper.
translation.es: Y miré el periódico.

translation.en: I knew who was refereeing the games because I looked at the master schedule.
translation.es: Sabía quién dirigiría cada partido.

translation.en: I gave him three plays,
translation.es: Le di tres ganadores

translation.en: and he called me up the next day and said, Is it really that easy?
translation.es: y al día siguiente me llamó y dijo: ¿Es así de fácil?.

translation.en: And I said, Wh… What happened?
translation.es: Pregunté: ¿Qué pasó?.

translation.en: And he goes, They all won.
translation.es: Dijo: Todos ganaron.

translation.en: Jack Concannon was booking with The Animals.
translation.es: Jack Concannon trabajaba con The Animals.

translation.en: Jack was a nickel better.
translation.es: Jack apostaba nickels.

translation.en: Jack's bets went up in denomination.
translation.es: Pero sus apuestas aumentaron.

translation.en: From him betting a nickel, and he's up to two dimes or three dimes.
translation.es: Pasó a apostar dos o tres dimes.

translation.en: And I'm like, Jack's not a two or three dime bettor.
translation.es: Jack no era así.

translation.en: So I'm like, Oh. What the hell's going on here?
translation.es: Pensé: ¿Qué diablos está pasando aquí?.

translation.en: There was a lot of different information I could use to make these picks.
translation.es: Había mucha información que podía usar para decidir.

translation.en: Referees would share information with each other.
translation.es: Los árbitros compartíamos información.

translation.en: Maybe a referee had an issue with a coach or a player.
translation.es: Quizá un árbitro tenía problemas con un jugador.

translation.en: Maybe a trainer came into the locker room
translation.es: Quizá un entrenador dijo antes del partido

translation.en: before the game, said a couple of their players were hurt.
translation.es: que un par de sus jugadores estaban lesionados.

translation.en: A lot of it was inside information.
translation.es: Mucho era información privilegiada.

translation.en: I was very well aware of the rule
translation.es: Era muy consciente de la regla

translation.en: that referees were not allowed to bet on anything.
translation.es: de que los árbitros no podían apostar en nada.

translation.en: I remember telling him,
translation.es: Recuerdo haberle dicho:

translation.en: You better be careful.
translation.es: Ten cuidado.

translation.en: If you go down, you're gonna take our whole family down with you.
translation.es: Si caes, toda la familia caerá contigo.

translation.en: Didn't need the money. Between stock investments, between playoff bonuses,
translation.es: No necesitaba el dinero. Entre inversiones y bonos,

translation.en: I was making well close to 400,000 a year.
translation.es: ganaba cerca de $400 000 al año.

translation.en: I was near a line that I shouldn't have been near
translation.es: Estaba cerca de una línea límite

translation.en: and then jumped over it, giving picks
translation.es: y la salté dando información

translation.en: on games that I was officiating in the NBA.
translation.es: sobre partidos que dirigía en la NBA.

translation.en: I find out that Jack was betting Timmy's games.
translation.es: Descubrí que Jack apostaba en los partidos de Timmy.

translation.en: And if he's got that information,
translation.es: Y si tiene esa información,

translation.en: so I take it and run with it.
translation.es: la tomo y la uso.

translation.en: So if they were betting four or five dimes a game,
translation.es: Si apostaban cuatro o cinco dimes,

translation.en: then we'll just bet ten or 20 times the amount.
translation.es: nosotros apostábamos 10 o 20 veces más.

translation.en: He was a cash cow. It was incredible.
translation.es: Era la gallina de los huevos de oro.

translation.en: - Years later… -
translation.es: Años después…

translation.en: …I had a major falling- out with The Animals.
translation.es: tuve una gran pelea con The Animals.

translation.en: And we went our separate ways.
translation.es: Nos separamos.

translation.en: And that's when I decided to go after Tim.
translation.es: Y ahí fue cuando decidí ir tras Tim.

translation.en: Go sit down, bitch!
translation.es: ¡Siéntate, perra!

translation.en: Tommy, Patty, just wanna say congratulations.
translation.es: Tommy, Patty, quiero felicitarlos.

translation.en: I wish you the best of luck. Going to be a long life.
translation.es: Les deseo la mejor de las suertes y una larga vida.

translation.en: I hope you have many little kids, honey.
translation.es: Espero que tengan muchos hijos.

translation.en: God bless you. I love you, Tommy, from the bottom of my heart.
translation.es: Que Dios te bendiga, Tommy. Te quiero.

translation.en: Patty, take care of him. He's the best- paying boss in the world.
translation.es: Patty, cuídalo. Es el mejor jefe del mundo.

translation.en: - Thank you, I love you.  -
translation.es: Gracias, los quiero.

translation.en: Baba said, When is Timmy in town again?
translation.es: Baba dijo: ¿Cuándo viene Timmy a la ciudad?

translation.en: I need to meet up with him. He's in trouble.
translation.es: Necesito verlo. Está en problemas.

translation.en: I said, What? Tim? What do you mean he's in trouble?
translation.es: Dije: ¿Cómo que está en problemas?.

translation.en: He goes, Set up a meeting with him.
translation.es: Dijo: Organiza una reunión con él.

translation.en: So I said, Okay.
translation.es: Y yo: De acuerdo.

translation.en: I remember one time mentioning Battista's name to Donaghy on the phone years before that,
translation.es: Recuerdo que una vez había mencionado el nombre de Battista por teléfono

translation.en: and he goes, Tom, don't even mention his name on the phone with me.
translation.es: y él dijo: Tom, no menciones su nombre por teléfono.

translation.en: He said, I cannot be associated
translation.es: No pueden asociarme

translation.en: with anything like bookmaking or betting or anything like that.
translation.es: con ningún corredor ni nada relacionado a apuestas.

translation.en: So I never said that Battista wanted to meet up with him.
translation.es: Así que no le dije que Battista quería verlo.

translation.en: Why is everybody's story about the Marriott so different?
translation.es: ¿Por qué las historias sobre el Marriot son tan distintas?

translation.en: I think it's a… it's a… it's a, um…
translation.es: Creo que es…

translation.en: Dave, could we cut for a sec?
translation.es: ¿Podemos cortar un segundo?

translation.en: Tommy called me up and said he wanted to have dinner with me.
translation.es: Tommy me llamó y dijo que quería cenar conmigo.

translation.en: He shows up with Battista, and I said to him immediately,
translation.es: Apareció con Battista y le dije de inmediato:

translation.en: Tommy, what the fuck is he doing here? I can't be seen with him.
translation.es: ¿Qué diablos hace aquí? No me pueden ver con él.

translation.en: - - He looked at Battista, and then he looked at me like he saw a ghost.
translation.es: Parecía que había visto un fantasma.

translation.en: We sat down at the table. Battista said, Timmy, look, I know you're giving the games to Jack.
translation.es: Nos sentamos a la mesa. Battista dijo: Sé que le das información a Jack.

translation.es: Dijo que sabía que le daba información a Jack,

translation.en: picks for the last couple of years, and he was getting those picks…
translation.es: Dijo que sabía que le daba información a Jack, que él también recibía la información y que quería seguir recibiéndola.

translation.en: …and he wanted to continue to get those picks.
translation.es: que él también recibía la información y que quería seguir recibiéndola.

translation.en: And I said, Let's work together.
translation.es: Dije: Trabajemos juntos.

translation.en: But make me the sole guy.
translation.es: Pero quiero ser el único.

translation.en: Battista wrote on a napkin, 2K,
translation.es: Battista escribió en una servilleta: 2K

translation.en: and he held up the napkin.
translation.es: y la levantó.

translation.en: He goes, I'll give you this. Give them to me.
translation.es: Dijo: Te daré esto. Dame lo tuyo.

translation.en: I made him the greatest deal in the world.
translation.es: Fue la mejor oferta del mundo.

translation.en: If we win the bets, I'll give you two dimes.
translation.es: Si ganamos la apuesta, te daré dos dimes.

translation.en: - You're not gonna pay on your losses. -
translation.es: No pagas por las incorrectas. SIN PENALIDADES POR ELECCIONES INCORRECTAS

translation.en: Just fucking pick me winners. Give me the right side.
translation.es: Solo elige ganadores. Dime quién ganará.

translation.en: Tommy goes to the bathroom.
translation.es: Tommy fue al baño.

translation.en: I was alone with Battista.
translation.es: Quedé solo con Battista.

translation.en: He says,
translation.es: Dijo:

translation.en: You don't want us calling the NBA and telling them what you've been doing.
translation.es: No quieres que llamemos a la NBA y digamos lo que haces.

translation.en: Worse yet, you don't want somebody from New York visiting your wife and kids in Florida.
translation.es: Y no quieres que alguien de Nueva York visite a tu familia en Florida.

translation.en: Okay, here's Bridget! Bridget's first birthday!
translation.es: ¡Aquí está Bridget! ¡El primer cumpleaños de Bridget!

translation.en: And when he said that, I was scared.
translation.es: Cuando dijo eso, me asusté.

translation.en: You know, not really of Battista
translation.es: No me asustaba Battista,

translation.en: but people that he was most likely dealing with.
translation.es: sino la gente con la que trabajaba.

translation.en: All right, are you ready?
translation.es: ¿Están listos?

translation.en: The job I had, the family I had,
translation.es: El trabajo que tenía, la familia que tenía…

translation.en: I really didn't have a choice.
translation.es: No tenía opción.

translation.en: Yay!
translation.es: ¡Viva!

translation.en: Had he not made the threat, would you have bet with him?
translation.es: Si no hubiera hecho esa amenaza, ¿habrías trabajado con él?

translation.en: No. If it wasn't for that, I definitely would not have bet with him
translation.es: Sin la amenaza, no habría apostado con él

translation.en: because I knew he was just a… a schmuck and an asshole.
translation.es: porque sabía que era un imbécil y un cretino.

translation.en: Anyone that had anything to do with him
translation.es: Todos los que se vinculaban a él

translation.en: always, you know, moved away from him.
translation.es: terminaban alejándose de él.

translation.en: Timmy was fucking thrilled to work with us. To make money.
translation.es: Timmy estaba encantado de trabajar con nosotros y ganar dinero.

translation.en: That's a tough call. I think it's the correct call…
translation.es: Una decisión difícil, pero correcta…

translation.en: Of all the fucked- up things I did,
translation.es: De todas las cosas jodidas que hice…

translation.en: never threatened him.
translation.es: Nunca lo amenacé.

translation.en: You don't win people over threatening people.
translation.es: No puedes convencer a alguien amenazándolo.

translation.en: You get farther with honey.
translation.es: Es mejor persuadirlo.

translation.en: I did not see Battista threaten Donaghy,
translation.es: No vi a Battista amenazar a Donaghy.

translation.en: and Battista's pissed off about this because he doesn't wanna be portrayed
translation.es: Battista está enojado porque no quiere que lo vean

translation.en: as the type of person that would go threaten people's families,
translation.es: como alguien que amenaza familias.

translation.en: and I don't think he is that type of person.
translation.es: No creo que sea así.

translation.en: I know he's not.
translation.es: Sé que no lo es.

translation.en: To me, it wasn't a life- or- death situation.
translation.es: Para mí, no era una situación de vida o muerte.

translation.en: If it was, I would have bailed.
translation.es: Si lo hubiera sido, me habría ido.

translation.en: I'm not into that shit, you know?
translation.es: No me gusta esa mierda.

translation.en: After our meeting at the Marriott that night,
translation.es: Después de nuestra reunión en el Marriott,

translation.en: I was in town to referee Boston at Philly.
translation.es: fui árbitro de Boston contra Philly.

translation.en: The day prior, I was refereeing with Derrick Stafford.
translation.es: El día anterior, había trabajado con Derrick Stafford.

translation.en: He had said he felt like Mo Cheeks had no idea what he was doing,
translation.es: Dijo que Mo Cheeks no tenía idea de lo que hacía,

translation.en: and his heart wasn't into coaching, and not only that,
translation.es: que no le gustaba entrenar. Además, Filadelfia buscaba una mejor posición en el draft,

translation.en: Philly was tanking games for better draft picks,
translation.es: Además, Filadelfia buscaba una mejor posición en el draft,

translation.en: so they really weren't trying.
translation.es: no intentaban ganar.

translation.en: So, I told Battista to bet Boston.
translation.es: Le dije a Battista que apostara por Boston.

translation.en: …rebounding now.
translation.es: …el rebote.

translation.en: Telfair quickly ahead to Allen. Allen takes it right at Iguodala for two.
translation.es: Telfair se la pasa a Allen. Allen ataca a Iguodala y anota.

translation.en: Boy, that's what I like, quick up the floor.
translation.es: Eso es lo que me gusta, una transición rápida.

translation.en: Pierce 0 for 2 to start the game, and Iguodala goes coast to coast.
translation.es: Pierce, 0 de 2 para empezar. Iguodala va de costa a costa.

translation.en: Seven- point Philly lead, their biggest of the night.
translation.es: Filadelfia gana por siete puntos.

translation.en: - Iguodala, his second steal and basket. -
translation.es: Iguodala, su segundo robo. Anota.

translation.en: Pierce to Allen, rebound, and he got fouled.
translation.es: De Pierce a Allen, rebote, cobran falta.

translation.en: Donaghy coming in from the outside.
translation.es: Donaghy pita la infracción.

translation.en: Boy, and that booing in Philly.
translation.es: Toda Filadelfia lo abuchea.

translation.en: I don't ever remember hearing them boo in Philly.
translation.es: Nunca oí al público de Filadelfia abuchear.

translation.en: At their own team!
translation.es: ¡A su propio equipo!

translation.en: The Philadelphia losing streak gets longer,
translation.es: Su racha perdedora se alarga.

translation.en: and Boston climbs to 8 and 13 now
translation.es: Boston ganó 8 de sus 13 partidos

translation.en: - on the season. -
translation.es: de la temporada. GANA LA ELECCIÓN DE DONAGHY

translation.en: After the Boston game, Battista came to me, and he said,
translation.es: Después del partido de Boston, Battista me contactó y dijo:

translation.en: Tim's new nickname is Elvis. Because he's the king.
translation.es: El nuevo apodo de Tim es 'Elvis'. Porque es el rey.

translation.en: - - And he was the king.
translation.es: Y era el rey.

translation.en: Battista was placing the bets,
translation.es: Battista hacía las apuestas

translation.en: getting the information through Tommy that came through me.
translation.es: con la información que yo le daba a Tommy.

translation.en: I would never talk to Timmy. He had to go through Tommy.
translation.es: Yo no hablaba con Timmy, solo con Tommy.

translation.en: Timmy would tell me who we would bet on
translation.es: Timmy me decía por quién apostar

translation.en: by my brothers' names.
translation.es: con los nombres de mis hermanos.

translation.en: My brother Johnny moved to Jersey. He was the away team.
translation.es: Mi hermano Johnny se mudó a Jersey. Era el visitante.

translation.en: My brother Chuck stayed here, so he was the home team.
translation.es: Mi hermano Chuck se quedó aquí, así que era el equipo local.

translation.en: He'd say, Hey, Tommy, what's going on? I'm in, uh, Boston.
translation.es: Tommy, ¿qué tal? Estoy en Boston.

translation.en: Hey, how's Johnny doing?
translation.es: ¿Cómo está Johnny?.

translation.en: Yeah, How's Johnny doing? Or, Who's he having Thanksgiving with?
translation.es: Sí: ¿Cómo está Johnny? ¿Con quién pasará Navidad?.

translation.en: All right, call me tomorrow.
translation.es: Está bien, llámame mañana.

translation.en: And I would relay it back to Battista.
translation.es: Y yo se lo transmitía a Battista.

translation.en: I made a lot of money.
translation.es: Gané mucho dinero.

translation.en: There was a few million bet on each game that I was in control of.
translation.es: Controlaba apuestas por un par de millones en cada partido.

translation.en: I was moving the most prominent gamblers in the world.
translation.es: Trabajaba con los mayores apostadores del mundo.

translation.en: I'd just charge them half, quarter, or 1%. We're moving millions of dollars a day?
translation.es: Les cobraba un 0.25, un 0.5 o un 1 %. Movíamos millones al día.

translation.en: - It was a printing press. Cash. -
translation.es: Era como imprimir dinero.

translation.en: Pepsi Center tonight, the Utah Jazz,
translation.es: En el Pepsi Center, los Utah Jazz, el mejor equipo de la División Noroeste, y…

translation.en: the top dog team in the Northwest Division at…
translation.es: el mejor equipo de la División Noroeste, y…

translation.en: Prior to this game,
translation.es: Antes de este partido,

translation.en: Allen Iverson and Steve Javie had butted heads for years.
translation.es: Allen Iverson y Steve Javie se habían enfrentado durante años.

translation.en: - I'm not gonna see everything, all right? - It happened so many times.
translation.es: No puedo ver todo. - Pasó muchas veces. - Allen, no…

translation.en: There was an issue where Iverson actually threatened Javie,
translation.es: Hubo un altercado en el que Iverson amenazó a Javie,

translation.en: and we felt as a staff that Iverson should have been suspended.
translation.es: y creíamos que deberían haberlo suspendido.

translation.en: We decided, before the game, we were gonna call palming violations on him.
translation.es: Decidimos, antes del partido, que cobraríamos sus regates ilegales.

translation.en: We knew he did it, we knew we could call it,
translation.es: Sabíamos que podíamos cobrarlos,

translation.en: but nobody ever did.
translation.es: pero nadie lo hacía.

translation.en: I even called up Javie that day and told him to watch the game
translation.es: Incluso llamé a Javie y le dije que viera el partido

translation.en: because we were gonna take justice into our own hands.
translation.es: porque íbamos a hacer justicia por mano propia.

translation.en: And we got a palming violation.
translation.es: Regate ilegal.

translation.en: Bernie called the first one. I called the second one.
translation.es: Bernie cobró el primero y yo cobré el segundo.

translation.en: It was a situation where it was gonna put Iverson at a disadvantage
translation.es: Eso pondría a Iverson y a Denver en desventaja,

translation.en: and Denver at a disadvantage, so I told Battista to bet Utah.
translation.es: así que le dije a Battista que apostara por Utah.

translation.en: Nuggets down by just six. Here goes Iverson. Score!
translation.es: ELECCIÓN DE DONAGHY: UTAH

translation.en: He wants an and- one. He thought Fisher was bodying him.
translation.es: Cree que Fisher le cometió una falta.

translation.en: Tim Donaghy will not call a foul when Iverson goes to basket.
translation.es: Tim Donaghy no cobra faltas cuando Iverson ataca.

translation.en: And the Nuggets, going to score a season- low 84 points tonight.

translation.es: En 2006, era el supervisor del escuadrón Gambino.

translation.es: Hubo investigaciones por homicidios,

translation.en: international distribution of drugs, extortions.

translation.es: Uno de ellos captó algo sobre información privilegiada en la NBA.

translation.en: I didn't know Tim Donaghy from a hole in the wall,
translation.es: No sabía quién era Tim Donaghy,

translation.en: but the fact that he came up with an active referee in the NBA was alarming.
translation.es: pero el hecho de que mencionara a un árbitro activo fue alarmante.

translation.en: He's working with somebody by the name of Martino
translation.es: Trabaja con unos tipos llamados Martino y Battista,

translation.en: and Battista, and they do a lot of talking.
translation.es: Trabaja con unos tipos llamados Martino y Battista, y hablan mucho.

translation.en: And because they do a lot of talking, there's information going to the Philadelphia mob.
translation.es: Y como hablan mucho, la mafia de Filadelfia recibe información.

translation.en: There's information going offshore.
translation.es: Hay información que llega al extranjero.

translation.en: And there's information going to,
translation.es: Y lo que nos interesaba era que había información que llegaba

translation.en: our particular interest, in the Gambino family.
translation.es: Y lo que nos interesaba era que había información que llegaba a la familia Gambino.

translation.en: There was always instances
translation.es: Siempre había momentos

translation.es: en los que estabas solo con tus pensamientos en un hotel.

translation.en: And I said to myself,
translation.es: Y me dije a mí mismo:

translation.es: No debería hacer esto.

translation.es: Recibía $2000 por cada elección correcta,

translation.es: y ganábamos entre el 70 y el 80 % de las veces.

translation.en: It got to the point where I forgot about Battista. I forgot about the threats.

translation.en: We'll do this to the end of the year. I'm gonna have fun with it, and it's over.
translation.es: Lo haremos hasta fin de año. Me divertiré y luego se acabará.
MIAMI CONTRA NUEVA YORK

translation.es: Una vez perdimos tres partidos seguidos.

translation.en: hanging from a tree somewhere, you know, as a message.

translation.en: So I wasn't gonna go out there whether we lost ten in a row and fix a game.

translation.es: Para que conste, aposté en 47 partidos con Timmy.

translation.en: We went 37 and ten.
translation.es: Ganamos 37 y perdimos 10.

translation.en: Thirty- seven and ten by the number. We crushed the number.
translation.es: Fue un porcentaje de éxito abrumador.

translation.en: he controlled the outcome.
translation.es: controlaba el resultado.

translation.en: Elvis was the King of Rock.
translation.es: Elvis era el rey del rock.

translation.es: Teníamos un acuerdo en el hotel.

translation.en: Shut the fuck up. The word was cranberries that we used.

translation.en: Cranberries was the code. Shut your fucking mouth.
translation.es: Arándanos era el código. Cierra la boca.

translation.en: Keep it between us.
translation.es: Entre nosotros.

translation.en: Stick to the fucking story.
translation.es: Cíñete a la maldita historia.

translation.en: Keep your mouth shut and don't tell anybody,
translation.es: Cierra la boca y no le digas a nadie.

translation.en: but we all know that that's not what he did.
translation.es: Pero no es lo que hizo.

translation.en: Battista was giving these picks to guys
translation.es: Battista le daba la información a gente

translation.es: que generaba millones de dólares

translation.en: Battista always wants to say he had nothing to do with the mob in New York,
